entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Uranium City
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:34 AM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -13.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Uranium City 09:00 AM CST Monday 13 February 2023
Temperature: -13.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -16.4°C
Wind: ENE 22 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature falling to minus 16 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this morning. Temperature falling to minus 16 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 32. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Clearing overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 13 February 2023
